title: How to Play Two Players on PSP

steps.title: Turn the game on.
steps.content: Turn the game on. You and your friend must have the same game which is the same type(PAL or NTSC).

steps.title: Make sure that there is a multiplayer option in the game.
steps.content: Make sure that there is a multiplayer option in the game.

steps.title: Make sure that the WLAN switch is 'on'.
steps.content: Make sure that the WLAN switch is 'on'. 1 of you must decide to 'host' the game and make all settings.

steps.title: The others may click on 'join game' or something like that.
steps.content: The others may click on 'join game' or something like that.

steps.title: Instead of the ad hoc mode, choose the infrastructure mode, to play over the net.
steps.content: Instead of the ad hoc mode, choose the infrastructure mode, to play over the net .

steps.title: You must follow other conditions i.e.
steps.content: You must follow other conditions i.e. type, wlan etc.
